
                            
                            <p>21 年支付宝活动买的鸡，买在顶部，一直不卖想着啥时候能回本，跌了三四十个点后再补仓，终于回本了 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/23/074851xlb3bwgbbqb29l02.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/23/074851xlb3bwgbbqb29l02.jpg"> <br>  <br> </p><p class="pl">你这种想法迟早会亏</p><p></p>
                            <p>
